FileFormat.FormatDescription: Template for iWork 13, Apple's office productivity suite, compatible with macOS and iOS operating systems. It is also available cross-platform through the iCloud website. iWork13 template files use a standard Zip file to store XML content together with other associated data, including index, Metadata and preview files.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: This format can be identified via a container signature in DROID version 6 or later. The PRONOM database cannot currently represent container signatures.
